key-input.all: - Keys not responding</br>- Delayed response</br>- Keys spamming</br>- Wrong key input

connection.2: - Detected but not in Razer Synapse
connection.all: - Not detected/br>- Detected but not in Razer Synapse</br>- Connection drops randomly/br>- Bluetooth not broadcasting</br>- Dongle pairing issue</br>- Bluetooth pairing issue

multimedia.all: - Volume knob incorrect response</br>- Volume knob no response</br>- No mic function</br>- No audio function</br>- Multimedia keys wrong response

key-lighting.all: - Flickering</br>- Lights are too dim</br>- Lights are uneven</br>- Wrong color</br>- Colors not syncing

power.all: - Stuck at X% while charging</br>- Poor battery life</br>- Charging too slow</br>- Keyboard does not charge
